Mendokusai

Tartarus

The Great Game

23 Feb 2020

Today I received a welcome reminder as to why PLO is lovingly dubbed “The Great Game”, and all other variants are secondary to it. It’s simply this; in PLO, you can bluff and get called by worse hands. Can a game be any greater than that?
